name: me.cxo2.rhythmcore
description:
An opinionated micro-framework to bootstrap or prototype your next rhythm game development.

It offers an agnostic core implementation for a rhythm game with no dependencies, allowing you to develop a diverse range of 2D / 3D rhythm games with any sound engine, input system, serialization library, or any modules of your choice.

Be it your classical VSRG (Vertical Scrolling Rhythm Game) or venturing into a Non-Standard Rhythm Game, you can always start with Rhythm Core!

samples.description: Contains sample implementation of the Standard Vertical Scrolling Rhythm Game (VSRG)
Contains sample implementation of the Lane-less Vertical Scrolling Rhythm Game (VSRG)
Contains sample implementation of the Non Scrolling Rhythm Game
Contains sample implementation of various tempo changes
